subject: here are some captures from box #12 session 2
author: bhali333
full_text:
I believe that each box carries it's own signature and the spirits that 
communicate through that box know the individual box by the energy it 
gives off. So they get used to a certain person that has been using 
that individual box and when the user changes they get somewhat 
confused about who is using the box. But I think they are getting used 
to me being the new user. my sessions are becoming more and more 
responsive. I have posted some file from session #2 with the box, they 
are in the files section please let me know what you think.

Bruce
